column5: Easy summer living! Welcome to Lakeshore Villas; a multi-unit complex both on the canal one block from the beach.This updated 2 bedroom, 2 bath fully furnished condo has a king bed in the master bedroom, bunk beds in the guest bedroom with a full on bottom and twin on top, to accommodate 5 guests. Some of the amenities include washer and dryer inside the unit, cable, wifi, all new furniture, updated appliances.
column8: LAKESHORE VILLAS, #13 2 BDRM, 2 BTH, WALK TO BEACH
